评论概述: Terrible Purchase - Not At All Like The Picture!
评论详情: I am beyond disappointed with this jumpsuit. First off, it looks NOTHING like the picture. The fabric is cheap, stiff, and uncomfortable—definitely not the soft, breathable material I was expecting. The fit is strange, and the cut is just… weird. It looks like something you'd wear to a funeral or, at best, a maternity dress. The silhouette is unflattering, and I honestly feel like I’m being swallowed by the fabric.  For $40, I expected something much better. This jumpsuit is an absolute mess and nothing like what was advertised. I wouldn't recommend it to anyone. Save your money and look elsewhere. ZERO STAR RATING

评论概述: It’s a great jumper, just not on my body type
评论详情: This is a super cute jumper. Nice floaty fabric. Easy stretch. However, I don’t think it’s great on my body type. For reference, I’m 5‘2“, 140 pounds. I carry my weight in my stomach and my bust, and have somewhat straight waistline. I think this would look better on someone with a smaller bust, smaller waist, and larger hips. My large bust pulled up the middle section and gave me the appearance of a super short waist.  I wish this could’ve worked for me! It is a really cute jumper, but I think will look better on a different figure.
